snippet: The whole room is a camera, in this Zoe Leonard show, and floor cushions encourage you to stay and meditate on the camera obscura’s strange reversals.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews installation by artist Zoe Leonard at Murray Guy gallery.
lead_paragraph: The whole room is a camera, in this Zoe Leonard show, and floor cushions encourage you to stay and meditate on the camera obscura’s strange reversals.

headline.main: Zoe Leonard’s ‘453 West 17th Street’ at Murray Guy
